title: Celebrating women in science
caption: Celebrating women in science
desc: For the International Day of Women and Girls in Science, we’re visiting the Great Barrier Reef with oceanographer Dr Sylvia Earle. This photo is from the 2014 documentary Mission Blue, which follows Earle, a legendary oceanographer, marine biologist and environmentalist. The film focuses on Earle's campaign to create a global network of protected marine sanctuaries.
copyright: Dr Sylvia Earle explores the Great Barrier Reef in a scene from Mission Blue (© Bryce Groark/AP Photo/Netflix)
